```{r}
library(yspec)

spec <- ys_load("analysis1.yml", .verbose = TRUE)

spec$STUDY

spec$WT

as.data.frame(spec)

data <- read.csv("analysis1.csv", na.strings = '.', as.is=TRUE)

ys_check(data,spec)

```


```{r, eval = FALSE}
ys_document(spec)

ys_document(spec, type = "regulatory")
```
